column5: Great video Simon!!!  Thanks for posting!  I bet grandad sure is proud of Jack!
Great post Simon! Thanks for sharing.
What great memories. Some beauty fish in there too! Thanks for sharing with us Simon.

Beautiful, simply beautiful. all four of u had a great time,  I see Jack having his own tv series one day, quite the fisherman, must have learned from his grampa, we all know Simon you  never catch anything  :tease: Cheers
very cool. great memories for everyone there
Hey simon what was the measurement on Jacks fish?  Was that a PB?  That kid(if he hasnt already) is gonna break the 30" mark waaaaaay before most!  And hes very well behaved in the boat!!!
Great video ..great family time ..nice golden walleye too ?
next time you have three generations together, I'd like to see a group pic of Jack with a 30", you with a 15" and Grandad with a baby walleye.  Good stuff Simon
Watching your videos always makes me smile Simon, thanks.
